body.p: In this tab, you can manage the software installed on the computer.
They are sorted by categories and are characterized by their name and version, the status of the latter.
The different categories can be presented "unfolded" or "folded" following the default user preferences (see Gérer ses préférences).
If a license is associated with the use of this software on that computer, the information will also be presented.
To install software, select its name in the list, then its version.
body.note: The combo box lists the available software in the entity.
The list of available software is configured in the software management (see Gérer les logiciels .
body.p: To associate a license for this computer, select the desired software and the license in the dropdown.
